panels.description: Shows the current build version of the SUI Bridge Node.
panels.title: Build Version

panels.description: Displays the chain identifier of the SUI Chain.
panels.title: SUI Chain ID

panels.description: Displays the chain identifier of the Ethereum Chain.
panels.title: ETH Chain ID

panels.description: Indicates whether the SUI Bridge client is enabled, showing 'true' or 'false' based on its current status.
panels.title: Client Enabled

panels.description: Displays the pause status for both ETH and SUI bridges.
panels.title: Is Bridge Paused

panels.description: Shows the current voting power distribution within the bridge committee, offering insights into the committee's decision-making influence and individual authority contributions.
panels.title: Voting Power

panels.description: Shows the current operational status of the SUI Bridge Node (UP/DOWN).
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Displays the uptime trend status of the SUI Bridge Node. Green indicates uptime is increasing, and red indicates it is not.
panels.title: Uptime Timeline

panels.description: Checks the health and availability of the SUI Bridge public metrics endpoint (/metrics_pub_key), which exposes the nodeâ€™s metrics public key used for authenticating pushed metrics.
panels.title: Metrics Public Key Status

panels.description: Tracks the health status of the SUI Bridge public metrics endpoint (/metrics_pub_key) over time, indicating availability and response consistency.
panels.title: Metrics Public Key Timeline

panels.description: Shows the current health status of the SUI Bridge public endpoint ingress, indicating whether the endpoint is accessible and responding to requests.
panels.title: Public Endpoint Ingress Status

panels.description: Tracks the HTTP response status of the SUI Bridge public endpoint over time, indicating HTTP endpoint availability.
panels.title: Public Endpoint Ingress Timeline

panels.description: Displays the latest finalized Ethereum block observed over time.
panels.title: Last Finalized ETH Block Over Time

panels.description: Displays the latest synced Ethereum blocks synced for each contract over time.
panels.title: Last Synced ETH Block Over Time

panels.description: This only increments when there is a sui event emitted. So it can stay flat when there is not such traffic.
panels.title: Last Sui Checkpoints of Detected Events

panels.description: Displays the number of inflight requests over time, categorized by request type, providing visibility into ongoing operations and potential bottlenecks in request handling.
panels.title: Inflight Requests Over Time

panels.description: Displays the rate of received and processed requests over time, categorized by request type, providing visibility into system throughput and processing capacity.
panels.title: Request Received Over Time

panels.description: Displays the rate of error requests over time, categorized by request type.
panels.title: Error Requests Rate Over Time

panels.description: Displays the latency distribution for spans in the bridge node service, categorized by span names. Latency is measured in milliseconds and displayed across the 50th, 95th, and 99th percentiles.
panels.title: Requests P95 Latency

panels.description: Displays the rate of Ethereum RPC queries processed over time, providing insights into query frequency and system workload trends.
panels.title: ETH RPC Query Rate Over Time

panels.description: Displays the Ethereum RPC query latency for 95th percentile.
panels.title: ETH RPC P95 Latency

panels.description: Displays the rate of error requests from Sui RPC over time, categorized by request type.
panels.title: Error Requests Rate Over Time

panels.description: Shows the overall performance ratio of the signer cache, indicating the percentage of cache hits vs total cache operations. Higher values indicate better cache efficiency.
panels.title: Cache Performance Ratio

panels.description: Shows the rate of cache hits per second for different cache types. This metric helps identify which cache types are performing well.
panels.title: Cache Hit Rate by Type Over Time

panels.description: Shows the rate of cache misses per second for different cache types. Higher values indicate cache inefficiency and may require attention.
panels.title: Cache Miss Rate by Type Over Time

panels.description: Displays the current balance of the gas coin for the SUI Bridge node. The balance is shown in SUI units, with regular updates reflecting the latest state.
panels.title: Client Gas Coin Balance

panels.description: Displays the current balance of the USDT vault for the SUI Bridge node. The balance is shown in USDT units, with regular updates reflecting the latest state.
panels.title: USDT Vault Balance

panels.description: Displays the current balance of the Ethereum vault for the SUI Bridge node. The balance is shown in ETH units, with regular updates reflecting the latest state.
panels.title: ETH Vault Balance

panels.description: Displays the current balance of the LBTC vault for the SUI Bridge node. The balance is shown in LBTC units, with regular updates reflecting the latest state.
panels.title: LBTC Vault Balance

panels.description: Shows the timeline of the SUI Gas Balance for the SUI Bridge Node.
panels.title: Client Gas Coin Balance Over Time

panels.description: Shows the timeline of the SUI Gas Balance for the SUI Bridge Node.
panels.title: USDT Vault Balance Over Time

panels.description: Shows the timeline of the SUI Gas Balance for the SUI Bridge Node.
panels.title: ETH Vault Balance Over Time

panels.description: Shows the timeline of the LBTC Balance for the SUI Bridge Node.
panels.title: LBTC Vault Balance Over Time

panels.description: Displays the current balance of the WBTC vault for the SUI Bridge node. The balance is shown in WBTC units, with regular updates reflecting the latest state.
panels.title: WBTC Vault Balance

panels.description: Shows the timeline of the WBTC Balance for the SUI Bridge Node.
panels.title: WBTC Vault Balance Over Time

panels.description: Displays the rate of received events in the Sui Watcher over time, providing insights into event processing throughput and anomaly detection.
panels.title: Events Rate Over Time

panels.description: Displays the rate of unrecognized events in the Sui Watcher over time, providing insights into event processing throughput and anomaly detection.
panels.title: Unrecognized Events Rate Over Time

panels.description: Displays the rate of transfer actions received by the bridge watcher over time, showing both SUI to ETH and ETH to SUI transfer directions.
panels.title: Transfers Received Over Time

panels.description: Shows the rate of token transfers that have been approved by the bridge committee over time, tracking both ETH to SUI and SUI to ETH transfer approvals.
panels.title: Transfers Approved Over Time

panels.description: Tracks the rate of token transfers that have been successfully claimed by users over time, showing completion rates for both ETH to SUI and SUI to ETH transfers.
panels.title: Transfers Claimed Over Time

panels.description: Shows key metrics for the Bridge Action Executor queue, including totals for received, skipped, and already processed actions, helping monitor queue performance and efficiency.
panels.title: Action Executor Signing Queue Over Time

panels.description: Displays metrics for the execution queue in the Bridge Action Executor, including totals for received actions and actions skipped due to pausing, providing insights into queue activity and processing behavior.
panels.title: Action Executor Execution Queue Over Time

panels.description: Displays error metrics for the Bridge Action Executor, including failures during Sui transaction execution, submission errors, and continuous submission failures, helping identify and address recurring issues.

targets.legendFormat: submit sui tx too many failure {{host}}

panels.title: Action Executor Errors Over Time

panels.description: Monitors governance actions observed by the bridge node over time, tracking important administrative changes and committee decisions that affect bridge operations.

targets.expr:
bridge_observed_governance_actions{environment="$instance", action_type!="committee_member_registered", action_type!="committee_member_url_updated", action_type!="new_token_registered"} > 0 unless bridge_observed_governance_actions{network="$network", job="sui-bridge", action_type!="committee_member_registered", action_type!="committee_member_url_updated", action_type!="new_token_registered"} offset 5m > 0
or
bridge_observed_governance_actions{environment="$instance", action_type!="committee_member_registered", action_type!="committee_member_url_updated", action_type!="new_token_registered"} > bridge_observed_governance_actions{network="$network", job="sui-bridge", action_type!="committee_member_registered", action_type!="committee_member_url_updated", action_type!="new_token_registered"} offset 5m

panels.title: Governance Actions Over Time

list.description: This variable dynamically fetches and displays all available SUI Bridge environments (aliases) from the config.yml file based on the configured bridges.
list.label: Bridge Target
list.name: instance
